name: The Powerpuff Girls: Drill Drama
description:
Oh no! Your sisters have been captured by the nefarious Drill King! (which is why you only play as Blossom yeah thats totally the reason and not due to time constraints!!) He has also sent out his minions to attack Townsville! It's up to you (Blossom, not you) to stop them and save your sisters!

Made for the MFGG Winter Fangame Jam

CONTROLS

Movement - Arrow Keys (Keyboard / D-Pad (Xbox controller) / Left joystick (Also Xbox controller)

Shoot - Z (Keyboard) / A (Xbox controller)

Ice Breath (Special Attack) - C (Keyboard) / B (Xbox controller)
